Name: SantaFairy
Text: I want to go to the human world

Name: OtherSantaFairy
Text: What? Are you going to the human world? I want to go too!!

Name: SantaFairy
Text: Only a fairy can go to the human world. You can't go!

Name: OtherSantaFairy
Text: Do you think you can go through that rough aisle?
